casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Raymond Vaughn PATTON. No. D-2755. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 9, 2013.

Raymond Vaughn Patton, of Brentwood, California, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
